title: The White Tab Curse
body:
Every time I go into any match, there's always a white tab on top of my screen when I'm fully screened in to League of Legends, and it doesn't seem to go away. I need help guys.
If it helps, the tab says League of Legends and has a "X" to exit out of the match and  fully screen sign symbol but it won't let me use it.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: I've had that recently too I haven't changed any of my settings and instead of going to full screen it goes windowed, it only started last patch after I had some issues with lag and trying to reconnect to the game. It messes with the camera as I can't get it to move towards to the blue nexus corner of the map less I drag by the mini map or I play with camera lock.
Are you playing in Fullscreen, Windowed, or Borderless?
I'd like to help out, but I'm not really sure what you mean!  Can you provide a screenshot of this, and anymore detail?  Thanks!
